metadata.synopsis: Gale is interested in items woven with especially powerful magic. In these lines, you come across one such item. This one is a an amulet of Selune.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Fancy amulet like this is probably enchanted. Gale, take a look.

0.speaker: Gale
0.text: Forged with Selûne's blessing. Yes, I can most certainly use this!
